page.title: 07JENNIFER'S DAY AT MARYKIRK 1
page.content: My name is Jennifer and I am 11 years old. I live in the new houses in Marykirk. I have one sister, Kirsten, aged 14. I was born in Falkirk and we moved to Marykirk in 1977. This is how I spend a Friday. I rise at 7:45 a.m., wake my sister, wash and dress in my school clothes. For breakfast, I eat rice crispies and a piece of toast and drink fresh orange juice. Before school, I help my father by watering the plants in the greenhouse where we grow tomatoes, cucumbers, peppers, melons, courgettes and flowers. I learn my spelling then leave the house at 9:00 a.m. I call for Debbie and we walk through the park to school which begins at 9:30 a.m.
